SpellBookGenerator.Title: Spellbook Generator
SpellBookGenerator.Description: Adds actor linking, allowing second actor to appear in rollData via '@_linked'.
SpellBookGenerator.Instructions:
Drag & drop valid actor onto this dialog to register them.
Alternatively use the dropdown menu for it.

They will be registered as the spellbook's owner and used to filter spellcasting classes.
SpellBookGenerator.Name: Linked name
SpellBookGenerator.ActorNotLinked1: There is no actor linked to restore/transfer spellbook progress to. Please link one.
SpellBookGenerator.ActorNotLinked2: There is no actor linked to populate the spell list from. Please link one.
SpellBookGenerator.InvalidDrop: The dropped entity is not a valid item.
SpellBookGenerator.InvalidSpellLevel: The "{spell}" spell does not have a valid level and cannot be added to the spellbook. (Level: {level})
SpellBookGenerator.LinkedActorNotFound: SPELLBOOK GENERATOR | Linked actor {actorId} not found!
SpellBookGenerator.InvalidSpellItem: The spell item could not be found or opened.
SpellBookGenerator.SpellListSelection: Select which spellbook to populate the spell list from.
